definition: not worth it
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
(negative prefix)/not/no
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Madam, it's not worth to take risk, your life is precious.
sentences.chinese: 夫人，划不来嘛，你的命很值钱的。

sentences.english: I am going to see an exhibition about Australia.
sentences.chinese: 那一个人去看展览实在是划不来。

sentences.english: It is not worth while to go round the world to count the cats in Zanzibar.
sentences.chinese: 数桑给巴尔岛的猫儿有多少只而寰游世界是划不来的。

sentences.english: That's really not worthwhile going to see that alone.
sentences.chinese: 那一个人去看展览实在是划不来。

sentences.english: Jack: That’s really not worthwhile going to see that alone.
sentences.chinese: 那一个人去看展览实在是划不来。

sentences.english: Spend some money does not matter, the body does not pay to eat bad.
sentences.chinese: 花点钱不要紧，吃坏身体划不来。

sentences.english: It isn't cost-effective to open classes with so few students.
sentences.chinese: 学生数这么少就开班从成本上讲划不来。

sentences.english: They can't afford not to hire you if that's the case.
sentences.chinese: 如果真是这样的话，他们不聘请你绝对划不来。

definition: it isn't worth it/not cost-effective/not profitable/too expensive
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
worth it/it pays to
worthwhile/to be a good deal/to be a bargain/to reckon up/to calculate
see 犯不著|犯不着[fan4 bu5 zhao2]
not worth
not worthwhile
to squander money/to spend extravagantly
troublesome/to take a lot of trouble to do sth
to pay for sth with the loss of (one's health etc)/to have sth come at the cost of (one's reputation etc)
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)/to suffer a double loss after trying to trick the enemy
pinyin: pei2 le5 fu1 ren2 you4 zhe2 bing1

definition: to feel very apologetic
cannot afford/cannot bear the burden
to endure hardship/to suffer
intolerable/unacceptable
arduous and thankless task (idiom); strenuous and unrewarding
